description:
Replace worn out front sections on your Dart crampons, or augment your Petzl mountaineering crampons for ice or mixed climbing.

  • Compatible with all Petzl rear crampon sections
  • Modular front points allow you to configure crampons to what you're climbing each day
  • Comes as a pair, with anti-snow plates
name: Petzl Dart Crampon Front Section
